description: Represents a DAO proposal with status tracking (DRAFT/ACTIVE/CLOSED). No voting logic.
name: Proposal

operations.description: Sets or initializes the proposal details
operations.name: SET_PROPOSAL_DETAILS
operations.schema:
input SetProposalDetailsInput {
  daoId: String!
  title: String!
  description: String
  budget: Float
  deadline: DateTime
  createdBy: String!
  createdAt: DateTime!
}
operations.template: Sets or initializes the proposal details

operations.description: Updates the proposal status (DRAFT, ACTIVE, CLOSED)
operations.name: UPDATE_PROPOSAL_STATUS
operations.template: Updates the proposal status (DRAFT, ACTIVE, CLOSED)

global.schema:
type ProposalState {
  daoId: String
  title: String
  description: String
  status: String
  budget: Float
  deadline: DateTime
  createdBy: String
  createdAt: DateTime
  closedAt: DateTime
}
